Description: On VA-3 in the County of Westmoreland, in the vicinity of Kenwood Rd; Rt. 659E/W (Westmoreland County), motorists can expect delays due to weather. All east lanes are closed. The west through lanes are closed.

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 167.4 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south right shoulder is closed.
